title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example in Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2/KDE 2.2.10 (GTK2 only), the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved, but they do not have any effect.
EB: The scrollbars should be disabled in the ImageAnalyzer example.
SR: 1. Disable the scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example.
